## Vector2.DistanceSquared() method

Returns the squared distance between the vectors "value1" and "value2"

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static DistanceSquared(value1: ReadOnlyVector2, value2: ReadOnlyVector2): number;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  value1 | <code>ReadOnlyVector2</code> | defines first vector |
|  value2 | <code>ReadOnlyVector2</code> | defines second vector |

<b>Returns:</b>

`number`

the squared distance between vectors
